name: BSVP - Bingo Slots Video Poker
description:
Come & Enjoy BSVP!

Bingo, Slots and Video Poker in ONE game!

Choose your favorite game, or you can play all of them!

* B *
- Play up to 6 bingo cards at a time.
- Play in your pace.
- Get BINGO with free daub items.
- Earlier BINGO pays more rewards.
- Collect FREE cards and items regularly.

* S *
- Enjoy Vegas-style slot machine.
- Bet up to 5 paylines.
- Collect FREE credits regularly.

* VP *
- Enjoy over 20 different games.
- Collect FREE credits regularly.
- Double up your winnings.
- Speed up! Play in your pace.
- Choose your affordable denomination and bet.

Let's play BSVP now!
